accessibility.question: Is the road leading to the nursery trafficable?
Is there a nursery sign post?
Does the nursery design allow easy movement of vehicles and people?

seed source.question: Are the seeds purchased from KEFRI recognized seed sources?
Are the seeds true to type?
Do you have seed storage facility?

seedling quality.question: Are the seedlings well positioned/well centered in the pot relative to the root ball?
Is there one plant per pot that is single, straight, sturdy and well centred in the pot?
Is there absence of overgrown seedling in the nursery/seedling carried over from the previous season?
Is there any signs of root distortions? Are the roots well balanced and developed with no coiling in the pots? Is there satisfactory root plug development?
Is there a good Root: Shoot ratio (1:2)? Are ready seedlings having the shoot twice the root in height?
Are the seed or transplant beds constructed at the recommended height(at least 30cm high) to facilitate proper root development?
Is the nursery weeded? Free from weeds?
Are there symptoms of nutrient deficiencies(Coloration)?

For Nurseries raising, Eucalyptus, Pinus patula Grevelia robusta, Grevilea robusta: Is transplanting of the germinated seedlings (pricking out) to the growing beds/pots done with great care to prevent deformation of the root system?

seedling health.question: Are there incidences of plant pests of commercial species 1?
Are there incidences of plant pests of commercial species 2?
Are there incidences of plant pests of commercial species 3?
Are there incidences of plant pests of commercial species 4?
Are there incidences of plant pests of commercial species 5?
Are there incidences of plant diseases of commercial species 1?
Are there incidences of plant diseases of commercial species 2?
Are there incidences of plant diseases of commercial species 3?
Are there incidences of plant diseases of commercial species 4?
Are there incidences of plant diseases of commercial species 5?
For any pests, were they reported to the relevant authorities (KEFRI) and appropriate preventive and control measures taken?
For any diseases, were they reported to the relevant authorities (KEFRI) and appropriate preventive and control measures taken?
Are there any management system, knowledge or effort to control pest and diseases?

seedling care & maintenance.question: Are young seedlings put under shade after pricking out?
Is the nursery weeded? Free from weeds?

Record keeping.question: Are the seed and seedlings purchase records kept up to date? E.g(date of receipt, supplier,species, Lot No. etc.)
Are the seed sowing and germination records/data recorderd?
Are the financial transactions recorded? E.g(payment vouchers, receipts, invoices etc)
Are activity records kept to date?
Are fertilizers, pesticides and fungicides used recorded?
Are pests and diseases incidences records made?
Are there records of the nursery stock?
Do they have an up to date vistors book?

Nusery beds.question: Are the beds well aligned in the East - West direction?
Are the beds constructed at the recommended height and width?
Is each bed clearly labeled with species and sowing details
Are the beds partitioned for easy stock taking as well as maintenance?
Is the shade provided to the seedlings?
Are the beds free of weeds?

Growing media and potting.question: Are the pots used of the recommended sizes?
Do the tubes have perforations to allow for excess drainage?
Is the media cohensive for transport?
Is the soil ball around the roots stable?

General nursery hygiene/neatness.question: Is the nursery and it's surrounding clean and tidy?
Is there a rubbish pit? Is waste/refuse disposed of in appropriate manner?

Environment.question: Are there alternative/innovative potting materials used in the nursery?
Are the  potting  materials disposed off in an appropriate manner? Does the nursery recycle, re-use or bury old polythene pots
Are there signs or soil erosion in the nursery ?

Watering quality & quantity.question: Is the water used clean and clear of suspensions?
Are there adequate water storage facilities?
Does the nursery have a reliable water supply source?
Do they use the right watering equipments/tools?

Nursery protection.question: Is there a fence to protect the nursery from animals and other intruders
Is the nursery protected from wind damage?
Does the nursery quarantine plants from other nurseries? Is there isolation from other plants?

Workers welfare.question: Are workers provided with appropriate clothing and personal protective Equipment(PPE)?
Are the workers provided with some shade to carry out some operations?
Is the ERGONOMICS taken into consideration in the working environment?
Is there a toilet for workers and other vistors?
Is there a complete (well-stocked) first aid kit in the nursery?
Is there a trained First Aider with valid  training certificates?
Are employment contracts available for employees? Is a signed copy of the formal work contract available?

stores.question: General appearance and cleanliness of storage area: Is the store well organized and are there shelves to clearly separate tools, safety equipment, chemicals, food etc?
Is the tools register kept up to date?

skills.question: Evidence of having attended a training in nursery management from a recognized institution?
